content: super simple stitch scarf a simple scarf using one stitch the tunisian simple stitch the jagged edging gives the scarf some dynamic and gives a nice flow around the neck great skinny scarf for summer evenings or just as a decorative piece <3 for personal use only copying or reselling is not allowed ©2020 terese auestad please read the pattern notes before you start skill level -
